Name: Cricket 19
About the game: Earn World Glory At The Pinnacle Of Cricket! Lead your team to international glory with Cricket 19. The truly global cricket simulation from Big Ant Studios, the leading name in authentic, realistic cricket action, Cricket 19 allows you to take control of your team, from club through national level, and lead them to T20, ODI, or Test Match glory. Create your own club, stadia, sponsor logos and uniforms via Big Ant’s acclaimed Cricket Academy to recreate your local matches and dramas! Build a rookie player’s career from their junior years at club cricket. Perform well and before you know it, you’ll be leading your nation on to the field. Key features include: Deep player, stadia, logo and scenario creator. Full support for all formats of cricket - T20, ODI and Test Match. Real world AI and tactics. Dozens of teams to choose between.
Meta Title: Cricket 19: Jul 30, 2019, Big Ant Studios and Full Overview
